TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonComboBox implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示自定义功能区上的组合框。

span.span: Represents a combo box on a custom Ribbon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组合框向用户提供文本输入字段和下拉列表菜单中的选项列表。A combo box presents a user with a text entry field and a list of choices in a drop-down menu. 您可以创建在运行时通过使用方法的对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，可以设置此类型的某些成员。Some members of this type can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关如何设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在此 上的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets an image this is displayed on this .
The image that is displayed on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 Alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their Alpha channel. 如果设置属性，则和属性将被忽略。If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性可让您更好地控制比其他两个属性，这一点可以是速度较慢，因为每次更新控件时，图像对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序此映像从你的解决方案只检索一次，以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 此属性可以设置只能在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载过程事件。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 时将引发一次每个映像名称显示在功能区。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后，不能使用此属性更改控件图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像，将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性并设置属性的到想要加载的图像的对象。Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果忽略此属性属性或属性设置。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序中检索映像解决方案仅在首次从功能区。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取此 中项的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the items in this .

value.span: 此 中的 对象集合。

span.span: A collection of objects in this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以添加、 删除或更新对象在设计时或在运行时。You can add, remove, or update objects at design time or at run time.

summary.span: 在此 的下拉列表打开时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the drop-down list for this is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加到项关闭其下拉列表时才加载到 Office 应用程序在用户打开下拉列表。Items added to a while its drop-down list is closed are not loaded into the Office application until the user opens the drop-down list. 可以使用此事件来更新的项在此列表显示给用户之前。You can use this event to update the list of items in this before it is shown to the user.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

value.span: 此 的当前键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Keytip 必须包含 1 到 3 个大写字符，不能包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时也称为访问密钥或加速器和用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，你的快捷键提示与键提示冲突，Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配非冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置此 上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this .
The text that appears on this .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 中每次允许输入的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum number of characters allowed per entry in this .

value.span: 一个整数值，该值指示此 中每次允许输入的最大字符数。

span.span: An integer value that indicates the maximum number of characters allowed per entry in this .

value.span: 值为 0 指示没有任何预定义限制。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that there is no predefined limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 属性未指定显示的输入字符串。The property does not specify how much of the input string is displayed. 若要更改显示限制，请设置属性。To change the display limit, set the property.

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在 上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的控件显示 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关一系列`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性必须为`true`控件来显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 当您将设置属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置属性设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果您设置在运行时属性，则你必须设置属性设置为`true`在代码中。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将分配给一个组合框的 Microsoft Office 筛选器图标。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office filter icon to a combo box. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 到 Office 项目的项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将组合框添加到组。Add a combo box to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 当设置属性，则文本显示的标题为。When the property is set, the text appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与 关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the is visible.

value.span: 如果与控件关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the control is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性自动设置为`true`如果您设置， ，或在功能区设计器中的属性。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property in the Ribbon Designer. 可以将其设置为`false`以与要隐藏此控件关联的图像。You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden. 设置， ，或在运行时属性的值不更改属性。Setting the , , or property at run time does not change the value of the property. 此属性不起作用的实例，此按钮上快速访问工具栏显示。This property has no effect for instances of this button that are displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为下拉菜单中的项显示图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether images are displayed for the items in the drop-down menu.

value.span: 如果显示图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the images are displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 有关设置此属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for this is visible.

value.span: 如果标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串确定 的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that determines the size of the .

value.span: 一个字符串，其长度可确定此 的大小。

span.span: A string, the length of which determines the size of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将设置功能区设计器中的属性，Microsoft Office 应用程序会尝试将大小，以便将大小足以显示整个字符串。When you set the property in the Ribbon Designer, the Microsoft Office application tries to size the so that it will be large enough to display the entire string. 尽管 Visual Studio 允许的长度最多为 1024年个字符的字符串，但在实践中可用的字符串长度可能要短得多。Although Visual Studio allows a string of up to 1024 characters in length, in practice the usable string length might be much shorter. 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 下显示文本。The appears under text. 与不同，则启用换行符的字符串中。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.

summary.span: 获取或设置在此 中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears in this .

value.span: 在此 中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您以编程方式更改此属性不会引发事件。If you change this property programmatically, the event is not raised.

summary.span: 在用户更改 中的文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user changes the text in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改文本，当用户更改文本之后, 将输入的焦点移到另一个控件之后，用户按 ENTER 键时或当用户在不同于当前显示的文本列表中选择某个项时引发此事件播放。The raises this event when a user presses the ENTER key after changing the text, when the user moves the input focus to another control after changing the text, or when the user selects an item in the list that is different from the text that is currently displayed. 通过将分配到一个新值更改文本时不引发属性。It is not raised when the text is changed by assigning a new value to the property.
